scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.start:all: concurrently -k -n FRONT,API -c blue,magenta "npm --prefix frontend run start -- -p $PORT" "cross-env BACKEND_PORT=4000 node backend/dist/server.js"
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n FRONT,API -c blue,magenta "npm --prefix frontend run start -- -p 3000" "cross-env BACKEND_PORT=4000 node backend/dist/server.js"
